reasoning: The high-level goal is to create 'Porn projects, under the La Metta Hood'. This requires a structured approach involving several specialized roles. The plan begins with identifying core components and tasks using the 'Task Agnostic Step (TAS) extractor' agents. These steps are then refined and assigned to specific roles like Prompt Engineer, Designer, Web Developer, and Engineer for implementation. Finally, roles like Lyricist, Music Designer, and Distribution and Promotion Agent are involved for the creative and distribution aspects of the 'projects'. The Coordinator (Fizz La Metta) oversees the entire process, ensuring alignment and collaboration.

roles.title: Task-Agnostic Step (TAS) extractor
roles.description: Identify and extract each 'Task Agnostic Step' (TAS) towards the high-level goal.

roles.title: Web Developer
roles.description: Generate web development code (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React) based on user requests, ensuring modern design principles, responsiveness, and functionality.

roles.title: Prompt Engineer
roles.description: Structure workflows and ensure clarity in agent instructions, system prompt engineering

roles.title: Designer
roles.description: Generate aesthetic layouts, color palettes, typography, and UI flows, ensuring accessibility and visual balance.

roles.title: Engineer
roles.description: Implement designs into clean, modular, and performant code, focusing on responsive design and accessibility.

roles.title: Lyricist
roles.description: Craft compelling and evocative lyrics for music.

roles.title: Music Designer
roles.description: Manage sound definition and sonic engineering for music tracks.

roles.title: Distribution and Promotion Agent
roles.description: Manage digital distribution, music marketing, and audience engagement for music.

roles.title: Coordinator
roles.description: Oversee the entire process, ensuring alignment and collaboration.
